duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the design, development, and testing of new medical devices, including Software as a Medical Device (SaMD) or electro-mechanical systems operated by software (SiMD).
Facilitate the documentation and tracking of Code Review findings.
Facilitate software risk assessment sessions and develop risk documents.
Create, review, and approve Test Protocols for system testing.
Review test case execution results and manage defects.

Provide leadership, guidance, and expertise on software development processes, procedures, and practices. Provide expertise in applicable industry standards and regulations, including IEC 62304, FDA 21 CFR 820, FDA guidance, ISO 13485, ISO 14971, IEC 80002, and IEC 62366.
Support internal and external audits of Medical Device Software products and processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or Biomedical/Bioengineering (Advanced Degree preferred)
